title: Optus webmail sign-in with a new email address
content: I recently changed my email address. I can only sign into webmail using my old one. How do I change it to my new address? Optus claims it's a browser settings issue.
creator: brendanmcshane1

title: Website Fonts have a Black Stroke/Outline
content:
Some sites like OP.GG have a black stroke on letters. I've already looked at other forums and options.


Settings > Language and Appearance > Fonts and Colors > Advanced > Allow pages to choose their own fonts, instead of your selections above. This method does not work along with disabling high contrast (disabled already)

Any sort of help would be appreciated except telling me what I already did. Thank you
creator: aggrodzn

title: Firefox is screwing up my Firefox
content:
Running Windows 7 Pro with Firefox 92.0(64-bit). Once 2 days ago and just within the last 30 minutes I opened Firefox. Instead of opening to my homepage, I got a new Firefox page (white background) asking me something which I really didn't care about. Instead of wasting my time I clicked the Home icon and went to my Homepage (Yahoo by the way). The first time it happened (2 days ago) it separated all of my favorites with one line in between each, turned everything in the favorites white (no color). A pain in the ass to work with, so I finally did a rollback of the OS to August 30th, and then everything was OK. The Firefox experience just repeated itself 30 minutes ago and boy am I pissed. The same thing happened to my Favorites sections. What is going on and how can I fix it without doing an OS rollbackÂ ? 

                                                                                                       Thanks, Sam G
creator: sg23p7

title: Moderators: Yes, Users Still Hate Proton
content:
This thread will probably be locked, but I'm going to post it anyway, so that it can be seen by other users who agree. To summarize:

1. @cor_el, you've been particularly helpful in the past, and I value your input whether or not I agree with your responses, and whether you post those responses as a user or in your official capacity as moderator. 2. Users still hate Proton--the lack of contrast and the inability to reposition pop-up windows in particular. 3. User feedback matters. 4. I will not register for a third-party app simply to give direct feedback to Mozilla. Companies need to increase their capacity to engage with customers directly. Without customers, a company spits into the wind. 5. While I am proficient at a number of technology skills, I do not have the capacity to master CSS.

Thank you. ajk1962f
creator: ajk1962f

title: Firefox won't let me download anything?
content: Every time I try and download anything on the download queue it puts a yellow error symbol above the download. I've cleared all my browsing data and cache and it still will not work. Really need help. P.S. On Manjaro Linux
creator: encrypted401
